ygData.subject: Re: Guildstuff
ygData.msgSnippet: We could always delte thew guild and remake it as Force of Synergy!!!! ... -joe ============================= Joseph J. Normandin josephn@bu.edu
ygData.messageBody:
We could always delte thew guild and remake it as Force of Synergy!!!!
:):):) I will never let that name down!!!!!

-joe
=============================
Joseph J. Normandin
josephn@...
http://acs.bu.edu:8001/~josephn
=============================
----- Original Message -----
From: David Lari <kerik@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 1:48 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Guildstuff


> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> I am still working to resolve the E'ci guild issue. I have not received a
reply
> from my email to Kyala, so I sent a message to eqguilds@... this
morning
> explaining what I think the problem is. Until I get information from
Verant, I
> will not be able to get the guild set up on other servers and there is a
> possibility we may have to recreate the guild on Brell. Hopefully, someone
from
> Verant will get back to me soon.
>
> Here is my theory about what has happened. When I created our guild, I
> submitted the name as "Mystic Alliance". When I went onto Brell to get the
> guild tags, I noticed that the name was "Mystical Alliance" (note the
> difference MysticAL instead of Mystic). I honestly couldn't remember what
name
> was the correct one and thought that maybe I either requested Mystical or
that
> they made a typo and just changed it to Mystical, but I never gave it any
more
> thought.
>
> Then, weeks later we discover the name "Mystical Alliance" is in use on
E'ci.
> So, I think what may have happened is that there is a guild called
"Mystical
> Alliance" and another, ours, called "Mystic Alliance" and that the guild
GM on
> Brell gave me the wrong one. However, so far, I have not received a reply
to my
> inquiries.
>
> Because we may have the wrong guild, I don't want to set it up on anymore
> servers until I find out what is going on, since the solution may involve
doing
> a 'guilddelete' and getting it recreated by a GM again with the correct
name.
> So, be warned, if you are in the guild on Brell, we may have to start over
> again.
>
> In the meantime, if any of you happen to be on any server and see a real
GM
> (not a guild or apprentice, etc.) you may wish to ask them about this
issue. If
> they need to know what my station ID is to help clear up the mystery, it
is
> "LARIDJ", my last name and first and middle initials. Ask them if they
show a
> guild by the name of "Mystic Alliance" or "Mystical Alliance" as belonging
to
> that station ID. If you find out, post info to the list and/or tell me
(Dedric)
> on Brell in game. (If you tell me in game, I will also try to get over to
your
> server right fast and set it up with whatever name it really is.)
>
> I'll let you all know when I find something out.
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
>
